name: Memo Paris
description: Memo Paris is a luxury niche perfume house founded in 2006 by Clara and John Molloy. The company specializes in creating unique fragrances inspired by travel and evocative locations around the world. Each scent tells a story and captures the essence of its origins, combining intricate compositions with high-quality ingredients. Memo Paris is known for its artistic bottles and its commitment to the craft of perfumery, merging modern creativity with traditional techniques.

name: Mémoire Archives
description: Mémoire Archives is a niche perfume house known for its artistic and conceptual approach to fragrance creation. The brand was founded by a group of passionate scent designers, each contributing unique perspectives and expertise to the craft of perfumery. Mémoire Archives focuses on creating evocative scents that tell stories and evoke memories, often inspired by historical events and personal narratives. Their fragrances are characterized by high-quality ingredients and complex compositions, appealing to connoisseurs and those seeking distinctive and personal olfactory experiences.

name: Mémoire des Sens
description: Mémoire des Sens is a French perfume house specializing in creating artisanal fragrances that evoke memories and emotions. The brand emphasizes the artistry of scent-making, drawing on traditional techniques while incorporating modern sensibilities. Each fragrance is crafted to tell a story, allowing users to connect with their personal experiences and nostalgia through unique olfactory compositions.

name: Memoire Liquide
description: Memoire Liquide is a French perfume company that specializes in creating customizable and unique fragrances. Founded in 2014 by the passionate perfumer and entrepreneur, M. S., the brand is known for its innovative approach to perfumery, allowing customers to mix and match individual scents to create their own signature fragrances. Memoire Liquide emphasizes the personal connection between the wearer and their scent, aiming to facilitate a creative and personal olfactory experience. Their concept focuses on storytelling through scent, where each fragrance is designed to evoke specific memories or emotions. The brand has gained popularity for its artisanal quality, bespoke offerings, and premium ingredients sourced from around the world.

name: Mémoires d'Amour
description: Mémoires d'Amour is a niche perfume company that specializes in creating exquisite artisanal fragrances inspired by the themes of love and memory. Founded by a passionate perfumer, the brand strives to invoke emotions and nostalgia through its carefully crafted scents, often drawing on personal stories and cultural elements to formulate their unique compositions. Their perfumes are known for their artistic presentation and evocative narratives that resonate with a discerning clientele.

name: Memoirs of a Perfume Collector
description: Memoirs of a Perfume Collector is a brand that specializes in the curation and creation of unique fragrances that evoke personal stories and memories. The company emphasizes the emotional connection between scent and memory, offering bespoke perfumes that cater to individual tastes and experiences. It was founded by a passionate perfume enthusiast who believed in the profound impact fragrances can have on life, allowing individuals to express their identities through scent. Their offerings often reflect a blend of art and craftsmanship, focusing on high-quality ingredients and unconventional fragrance compositions.

name: Memoize
description: Memoize is a niche fragrance house based in the UK, known for its unique and artistic approach to perfumery. The brand emphasizes storytelling through scents, curating a collection that is designed to evoke emotions and memories. Memoize was founded with the vision of creating personal and evocative fragrances, each with a distinctive narrative, appealing to scent connoisseurs looking for niche luxury.

Founded with the mission to elevate men's grooming experiences, Men-U emphasizes a premium approach while maintaining a focus on sustainability and environmental responsibility.

They offer a range of products including facial cleansers, moisturizers, and shaving essentials, with an emphasis on natural ingredients and a refined aesthetic. name: Menard

Founded in 1959, Menard has a rich heritage in combining traditional Japanese beauty practices with modern scientific advancements. The company is particularly known for its unique approach to both skincare and perfumery, emphasizing quality ingredients and meticulous craftsmanship. Their perfume line reflects the same philosophy that characterizes their skincare products, offering a range of scents that are often inspired by the natural world and traditional Japanese culture. Menard aims to create products that enhance both beauty and well-being.

name: Mendittorosa

Each scent is designed to encapsulate a unique narrative, often drawing inspiration from the natural world and the art of perfumery. The company emphasizes the use of high-quality ingredients and craftsmanship, offering a collection that blends modernity with the essence of tradition.

name: Mennen

Mennen also ventured into fragrances, often targeting the drugstore market segment with affordable and accessible products. name: Miller Harris
description: Miller Harris is a luxury fragrance house based in London, renowned for its artisanal approach to perfume creation. Founded by perfumer Lyn Harris in 2000, the brand emphasizes the use of high-quality natural ingredients, blending unique elements to develop distinctive fragrances that tell a story and evoke emotions. Each scent is inspired by the world around us, often reflecting the beauty of nature and the intricacies of life, which resonates with those seeking individuality and sophistication in their fragrance choices.
address: 29a, Bruton Street, London W1J 6QP, United Kingdom

name: Miller High Life
description: Miller High Life is primarily known as an American beer brand produced by the Miller Brewing Company, famous for its slogan "The Champagne of Beers." While it is primarily recognized for its beer products, any association with perfume products appears to be a misunderstanding, as Miller High Life does not produce or market perfumes. The brand was established in response to consumer demand for high-quality beer but does not have a history or specialty in the fragrance industry.

name: Millot
description: Millot is a renowned French perfume house established in 1930, known for its rich history and dedication to the craft of perfumery. The company specializes in creating high-quality fragrances that are characterized by their unique blend of classic and contemporary scents. Millot has a reputation for producing luxurious perfume offerings that cater to an upscale clientele, making it a distinguished name in the niche segment of the fragrance market.

name: Milton-Lloyd
description: Milton-Lloyd is a UK-based fragrance company known for its innovative approach to high-quality perfumes at affordable prices. Established in 1975, the company specializes in creating a wide range of fragrances that cater to diverse consumer preferences, often imitating more expensive designer scents. Milton-Lloyd has built a solid reputation for delivering value without compromising on quality, making them a popular choice for both retail and online markets. The company prides itself on its ability to stay current with trends while maintaining a focus on classic fragrances.

name: Mimesis
description: Mimesis is a prominent perfume brand that specializes in creating high-quality, artisanal fragrances. Founded by a group of passionate perfumers, the company focuses on the art of scent, blending rare ingredients to develop unique olfactory experiences. Mimesis aims to engage the senses through narrative-driven fragrances, often inspired by art, culture, and nature. Their commitment to craftsmanship and innovation sets them apart in the competitive fragrance market.

name: Mimmina
description: Mimmina is a niche perfume company renowned for its artisanal approach to fragrance creation. Established with a passion for fine perfumery, Mimmina focuses on crafting unique and evocative scents that draw inspiration from nature and personal experiences. The company prides itself on using high-quality, sustainable ingredients, often sourced from various parts of the world. Its story centers around the belief that fragrance is a deeply personal form of expression, and it aims to offer customers an olfactory journey that resonates with their individuality.

name: MiN New York
description: MiN New York is a niche fragrance company that specializes in creating unique, high-quality perfumes. Founded by Chad Murawczyk and Aaron Terence Hughes in 2012, the brand emphasizes artisanal craftsmanship and the use of fine ingredients to produce distinctive scents inspired by the cultural and artistic vibrancy of New York City. Their offerings include a range of gender-neutral fragrances that aim to evoke emotions and capture experiences, reflecting the company's mission to transcend traditional perfume conventions.

name: Mind Games
description: Mind Games is a niche fragrance company known for its unique scent creations that often blend unconventional notes, aiming to evoke emotions and memories. Founded by a group of perfumers and artists in 2013, the brand focuses on conceptual fragrances that challenge traditional perfume norms and appeal to creative individuals. Each scent is crafted to tell a story, using high-quality ingredients and innovative formulas.

name: Ministry of Oud
description: Ministry of Oud is a fragrance brand that focuses on high-quality, artisanal perfumes, specializing in unique compositions derived from the ancient tradition of Arabian perfumery. Established by a team passionate about fragrance, the company emphasizes the art of perfumery through the use of natural ingredients and the rich cultural heritage of oud. The brand offers a range of fragrances designed to evoke emotions and tell stories, each inspired by different aspects of life and nature.

name: Ministry of Sound
description: Ministry of Sound is a well-known music and entertainment brand founded in London, primarily recognized for its contributions to the dance music scene since the 1990s. The brand has expanded into various areas, including the fragrance industry, where they have developed fragrances that resonate with their vibrant and energetic brand identity, often targeting a young and dynamic audience. Their scents reflect the spirit of nightlife and club culture, aligning with their musical legacy.
address: 103 Gaunt Street, London SE1 6DP, United Kingdom

name: Minnetonka
description: Minnetonka is a well-known lifestyle brand that specializes in handcrafted footwear and accessories, particularly renowned for its high-quality leather products. The brand has a rich heritage that dates back to its founding in 1946, initially as a manufacturer of slippers and soft-soled moccasins. Over the years, Minnetonka has expanded its offerings to include a range of fashion accessories, while maintaining its commitment to traditional craftsmanship. The company is celebrated for its unique designs that blend comfort with a distinct cultural heritage, inspired by Native American artisanship.

name: Minnie Wilde
description: Minnie Wilde is a contemporary perfume company known for its unique and artistic fragrance creations. The company aims to blend fashion with olfactory experiences, offering a range of perfumes that celebrate individuality and self-expression. Minnie Wilde’s story is rooted in a passion for storytelling through scent, with an emphasis on using high-quality ingredients sourced from around the world. Their specialty lies in crafting niche fragrances that often incorporate unusual notes, appealing to fragrance enthusiasts who seek something beyond mainstream options.

name: Mira Takla
description: Mira Takla is a luxury perfume company specializing in creating high-end, artisan fragrances. The brand is known for its unique blend of traditional perfume-making techniques and modern scent innovations. Originally founded by fragrance expert Mira Takla, the company has a strong commitment to quality and artisanal craftsmanship, drawing inspiration from various cultures and nature. Their fragrances are often characterized by rich, complex notes that cater to a niche market of scent enthusiasts looking for exclusive and distinctive olfactory experiences.

name: Miraculum
description: Miraculum is a Polish perfume company known for its unique and diverse range of fragrances. Founded in 1920, it has a rich history in the cosmetic and fragrance industry. The company specializes in creating perfumes that cater to a wide audience, offering elegant and sophisticated scents that reflect contemporary trends while honoring traditional values. Their product lines often emphasize affordability without compromising quality, making them popular among consumers in various markets.

name: Miraj
description: Miraj is a perfume company that specializes in creating and distributing a diverse range of fragrances tailored to various markets. Known for its blend of tradition and modernity, Miraj draws upon regional perfumery techniques while utilizing contemporary methods to cater to a global audience. Their product line includes both personal fragrances and home scenting solutions, emphasizing quality ingredients and craftsmanship. Originally established to bring the richness of Middle Eastern perfumes to a broader market, Miraj focuses on offering unique, culturally-inspired scent experiences.

name: Mirato
description: Mirato is a fragrance house known for its unique and diverse range of perfumes that cater to various consumer preferences. Founded in the early 19th century, Mirato has built a legacy in the perfume industry by blending traditional methods with modern technology to create high-quality fragrances. The company emphasizes craftsmanship and innovation, making it a respected name among both connoisseurs and casual fragrance enthusiasts. Mirato's specialty lies in its ability to produce distinctive scents that are often described as elegant and sophisticated.

name: Miriam Mirani - Aqaba
description: Miriam Mirani - Aqaba is a niche perfume company known for its unique and luxurious fragrances inspired by the rich heritage and culture of the Aqaba region. The brand is designed to encapsulate the essence of the area, featuring scents that evoke the Arabian landscape and lifestyle. Miriam Mirani focuses on quality craftsmanship and the use of fine ingredients, drawing from both traditional perfumery techniques and contemporary fragrance trends. The company aims to provide customers with an olfactory experience that reflects the spirit of Aqaba.

name: Mirko Buffini
description: Mirko Buffini is a perfume company renowned for its artisanal and bespoke fragrance creations. Founded by perfumer Mirko Buffini, the brand emphasizes the art of perfumery, utilizing high-quality ingredients to craft signature scents that evoke emotions and memories. The company focuses on individuality and self-expression, offering clients unique olfactory experiences tailored to their desires. Buffini's philosophy centers around creating fragrances that blend traditional perfumery techniques with innovative design, ensuring each scent is a work of art.

name: Miro
description: Miro is a fragrance company that specializes in the development and production of affordable perfumes that aim to provide high-quality scents for consumers. Founded with the vision of making luxurious fragrances accessible to a wider audience, Miro creates a diverse range of products that appeal to various demographics. Their offerings include both men’s and women’s fragrances that demonstrate a careful balance of ingredients, focusing on value without compromising on scent profile. Over the years, Miro has built a reputation for introducing innovative fragrances that cater to changing consumer preferences, making it a significant player in the mass-market perfume sector.

name: Mirum
description: Mirum is a niche perfume company that focuses on creating unique, high-quality fragrances inspired by nature and artisanal methods. Founded by a group of passionate perfumers, the brand seeks to blend traditional techniques with innovative concepts in fragrance creation. They are known for their emphasis on sustainable sourcing and eco-friendly practices, ensuring that their products resonate with consumers who value both luxury and environmental consciousness.

name: Mirus
description: Mirus is a niche perfume company known for its exclusive and handcrafted fragrances. Founded by a team of passionate perfumers, Mirus focuses on creating unique scent collections that embody artistry and luxury. With an emphasis on using high-quality natural ingredients and sustainable practices, the brand caters to a discerning clientele that appreciates the intricate craftsmanship behind each scent. Their collections often draw inspiration from various cultures and landscapes, resulting in an immersive olfactory experience for users.

name: Misc. Goods Co.
description: Misc. Goods Co. is a lifestyle brand that offers a curated selection of premium goods, including home fragrances and perfumes. Founded by a dynamic team focusing on creativity and unique design, their product lines often emphasize quality craftsmanship, unique scents, and a commitment to sustainability. The company seeks to provide everyday products that enhance the quality of life through thoughtful design and effectiveness. Their expansion into the fragrance market allows them to leverage their design ethos into creating captivating olfactory experiences.

name: Mischief Academy
description: Mischief Academy is a contemporary perfume company that prides itself on delivering whimsical and playful fragrance experiences. Founded by a group of creative entrepreneurs, the brand draws inspiration from the essence of childhood joy and the curiosity of discovery, crafting unique scent blends that transport users to imaginative realms. Their specialty lies in creating limited edition fragrances, often illustrated with vibrant packaging that appeals to both the olfactory senses and the eyes, making each product a work of art. The company engages actively with its community through interactive events and collaborations with artists.

name: Miskeo
description: Miskeo is a niche perfume company that specializes in creating artisanal fragrances inspired by nature and diverse cultural influences. Founded by a group of passionate perfumers, the company focuses on crafting unique scents using high-quality ingredients, often sourced sustainably. Miskeo's story began with a commitment to celebrate olfactory art and offer customized fragrance experiences for individuals who appreciate subtlety and complexity in scents.

name: Miss Anastasia
description: Miss Anastasia is a perfume company specializing in artisanal fragrances that blend luxury with personal expression. Founded by fragrance enthusiast Anastasia, the brand is known for its unique scent profiles that draw inspiration from global cultures and natural elements. Miss Anastasia aims to create perfumes that evoke emotions and memories, focusing on high-quality ingredients and craftsmanship. The company's story reflects a passion for the art of scent-making, and it has garnered a loyal customer base seeking distinctive and evocative fragrances.

name: Miss Kay
description: Miss Kay is a perfume company renowned for its unique and refreshing fragrance offerings that cater to a wide audience. Established with a vision to create scents that evoke memories and enhance personal expression, Miss Kay focuses on quality ingredients and artisanal production methods. The brand emphasizes creativity and sustainability, ensuring that its products are not only appealing but also environmentally conscious. Over the years, Miss Kay has built a loyal customer base, known for its artisanal style and commitment to creating fragrances that capture the spirit of joy and sophistication.

name: Miss Saigon
description: Miss Saigon is a fragrance brand inspired by the famous musical of the same name, which debuted in 1989. The company captures the essence of romance and adventure found in the narrative of love and loss set in Vietnam. Specializing in creating evocative scents that resonate with the themes of the musical, Miss Saigon aims to offer an emotional and memorable experience through its fragrances.

name: Miss Selfridge
description: Miss Selfridge is a British fashion retailer that is part of the Arcadia Group, known for targeting young women with trendy clothing and accessories, including fragrances. The brand was founded in 1966 and has developed a youthful and vibrant identity, providing stylish and affordable products. Miss Selfridge has become a go-to destination for fashion-forward consumers, offering a range of trendy perfumes that align with its overall brand aesthetic.

name: Miss Sixty
description: Miss Sixty is a fashion brand that encompasses a range of products including clothing, accessories, and perfumes. Established in 1991, the brand is known for its youthful and edgy style, appealing primarily to young women. The Miss Sixty perfume line reflects the brand’s trendy and innovative spirit, often capturing the essence of contemporary fashion while focusing on vibrant and playful scents that resonate with the target audience.
